website_summaries.verdict: This affordable bike is recognized for its comfortable ride and simple control, making it ideal for urban commuting.
pros: Bike frame crafted from high-quality, durable steel
Extremely smooth ride on concrete and roads
Customers enjoy the impressive bike they receive for the affordable value
cons: Steel frame makes the bike particularly heavy

customer_reviews.title: WANT IT, GET IT! It’s WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE this bike. It’s fast, it’s light for me to carry up 4 flights since I have no elevator, and it’s thin enough to fit in spaces in my small apartment. Besides from all that, it’s a very speedy bike. It’s quick, perfect for communting. I live in upper Manhattan and I cycled all the way to Times Square! I was sooo happy. Honestly this bike is great because it’s simple and made with good quality. Not to mention the color, it’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: First time riding the bike to school which was pretty flat only 3 small hills
customer_reviews.text: First time riding the bike to school which was pretty flat only 3 small hills, on the way back I lost power while pedaling, got off checked chain it was fine. I got on it and was spinning then I had power and road home but kept losing power every now and then. Just annoying for it to break on my first ride. Going to take it to bike shop that put it together and ask them for sure what the problem is and try and get my money back. Ill update how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Issues that can happen at this price point...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike, had it out together in 15-20 minutes. It rode great, no issues... By the way, if your tire is hitting the pedals, turn the forks the opposite direction. After a couple days riding, I tried to go up a hill, the right pedal stuck and then stripped out. I would suggest upgrading pedals pretty quick after purchase. The pedal wasn't cross threaded... I loved the bike untik then. It's a $40 fix, but it's frustrating to spend after only one week.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Neighbors

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for cost
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine this week, rode about 35 miles the past 2 days. Assembly was maybe 15-20 minutes. Tires were flat and it requires a unique valve for the pump, apparently a European style valve according to my local bike shop. I’ve seen a decent amount of complaints on the tire making contact with the pedal or the front brake hitting the down tube if you turn to sharp - I’m 95% sure all of those people installed the handle bars with fork facing backwards🤦🏼‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Karl Yaeger

customer_reviews.title: You get more than what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to figure out why the bike is so cheap. Assembly was a little tricky, but before this I had no experience assembling a bike and I was able to figure it out. I took it into a shop and they said everything looked great. I realize Retrospec might not appreciate this, but I ended up returning this bike because assembling it showed me how easy it would be to fix my old bike (which I did). The return process worked great too so it really felt like a seamless process. Way cool that you can buy a bike this good, this cheap, online.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ottesen

customer_reviews.title: Multiple problems. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Chain guard came broken. The left pedal threads are cross threaded, pedal will not attach on left side. Called customer service line, no answer.
customer_reviews.author: JD-BoilerUp

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed, Great Value for Cost
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product for the price. I was weary to buy this online, and feared it would be a Chinese piece of garbage - with poorly fitted components. However, the bike has decent build quality. It is steel, and a bit heavy, but much lighter than I expected. The bike was packaged very nicely, and assembly was simple. Great care went into the packing. Brakes are sufficient. Downsides are that the bike does not come with a kick stand, and the tires do not use the standard bicycle valves. Lucky adapters are cheap and easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: IBE

customer_reviews.title: First Time Bike Buyer
customer_reviews.text: I am an indoor cyclist (spin) and wanted to continue my cycling workouts after the closure of my athletic club. Outdoor and indoor cycling are different but not so much that I couldn't get the hang of riding outdoors. This is a great starter bike but make sure you are in decent shape or, do not plan to go up any hills. My bike is a single speed model. It is the perfect size, weight and strength (gears) for my needs. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband and he loves it. No issues so far and he’s ridden it to and from work all week. The sangria color is lovely. He was between this and the orange one, and worried as he was opening the box that it was going to be a pink. It’s actually a nice, muted vintage red that leans to the maroon side. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Read the bad reviews after buying but ten minutes into riding threads on the crank were the pedal goes were stripped and the pedal came off, not even going to bother talking to customer service after reading how awful they were to everyone else that had a problem, order a new crank assembly different brand.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best Fixie bikes I came across during my research. I was looking for several fixed gear bikes and this was on the top of my list. I have been using this bike for a month now and it has been great so far. Most of the assembly was already done. It took me less than half hour to put the rest together. The packaging came in perfect condition without any damages and arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Vikram

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for a few months, seems solid enough
customer_reviews.text: As stated, seems solid for most commuter and road use, obviously not for dirt trails, there is a slight "clink" sound where the pedals are but it could just be me nitpicking. Single gear, low maintenance, easy. FYI, the left pedal screws on the opposite direction than the right pedal for safety reasons, I almost thought the pedal thread was messed up but it wasn't. 4/5 overall
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Palaganas

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, quality parts
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived almost completely assembled with all the tools. I just needed an air pump to fill the tires. The tires come with good tubes and presta valves. the bike ride is awesome it's very fast and sturdy and the gears were already aligned when it arrived. My only complaint is that the handlebar grips are hard plastic and a little uncomfortable but that's an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: person

customer_reviews.title: Love the bike hate the missing part
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bike, easy to put together, and a pleasure to ride; however, I received my bike with the right rear brake screw missing and I had to improvise with what I had. Also, the rear reflector was missing. And I had been sent the wrong color (ordered black and received white). Couldn’t find a place to contact... I now own a bike and a helmet and find it a quality brand, so I hope I can get these issues fixed. I’ll be updating my review accordingly to the customer service answer.
customer_reviews.author: luc mazurier

customer_reviews.title: Great fixie for the price
customer_reviews.text: Unboxing the bike was simple and as long as you follow the instructions, assembly is an easy task. You will need a 15mm wrench or socket, but it comes with the necessary Allen wrenches. You will also need a hand/foot manual pump as they do not recommend using an air compressor. My only complaint thus far is the seat. It is narrow and not comfortable (to me) at all! However, this will be an easy and inexpensive fix. Overall, for the price, this is an excellent fixie for the suburbs or urban environment.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bell

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking, easy riding!
customer_reviews.text: Check out the video review. Liking it so far. We will see how well it holds up over time, but so far it’s a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fun ride for the $ but not fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: Took maybe 30 minutes to put it together and most of that time was undoing the packaging. Presta valves, so heads up- you'll either need a presta pump or an adapter. Flipping the hub from fixed gear to freewheel is super easy and takes -5 minutes, and installing/removing the back break takes less time than that. Wish it came with nicer pedals, but whatever, I'll get some at my local bike shop. Both wheels appear off-center. Like, a few mm over to the left of center. Not angled weird, but actually off-center. Rides fine, but that's weird, right?
customer_reviews.author: Blank

customer_reviews.title: VERRY unsafe bike... Unable to return.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely DO NOT BUY THIS BIKE! Once it was put together I could not go 3 feet without the pedal going into the wheel. I nearly face planted. VERRY UNSAFE BIKE. I tried returning but I could not fit back into the box even after taking bike apart. BUYING THIS BIKE will be a instant regret.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Dittman

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great fixed gear bike for the money. I made some changes such as a more comfortable seat. The size was a bit bigger than I expected, maybe should have gone with the smaller size. Only minor problem is the tires are lesser quality and don’t hold well over the course of a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for around town
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this bike and purchase! The price is good for what you get, in my opinion. The bike helps me complete exactly what I wanted it to do - commuting around town. Assembly was a little of a pain. The directions weren’t the clearest, and my box was pretty beat up. Tires were also flat. Once I got everything together and tires pumped, it works just how I wanted it to. Super cute too. Got it in the dark blue and brown seat/handle bars. Retro looking. Four stars just because packaging was beat up and directions not being clear, other than that I’m satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike!
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding this for about a month and absolutely love it. I've been riding single-speed but I'm going to give fixed a shot after I've got another hundred or so miles on it. People who complain about the pedal hitting the front wheel seem to have installed the handlebars backward! Read the directions when assembling and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: The bike arrived with scratches and the box looked abused ...
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived with scratches and the box looked abused - this bike had clearly been used before I got it. Amazon convinced me to keep the bike as returning would have been too much of a hassle. I wish I had just returned it. Less than a month into riding this bike the rear hub is completely shot and needs to be replaced. The labor and parts to do so are worth more than the bike. As with anything you get what you pay for. Don't buy this bike. Spend a little more for quality and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: BiggDawg

customer_reviews.title: Refund Issues & Bike Review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two bikes, one order was larger fit and I canceled that order the within hours since I've purchased it (it wasn't shipped yet), still was shipped. Regardless, I returned it; it was received on June 1 with no refunds. Contacted Amazon, been getting the run around and it's been half a month since it was received without receiving my refund (all parameters were met). I don't know where else to display my displeasure with the customer service and hopefully get my money back. Overall review of the bike. Strong heavy frame, cheap components. I replaced the tires and tubes, the bike has been a consistent ride with minimal maintenance since.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: great bike
customer_reviews.text: OMG it was a nightmare till we could inflate the tires. First, we had to buy new valves, which didn't work, then we had to buy a new inflator, and after managing how to properly do it, we could inflate them. Besides that, it's a great bike! super light and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: ana belen stanicio

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bike for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike! It’s been more than a year and only now is presenting a problem in the crank set that I meed to find out the measurements for to change. I would appreciate if the seller could tell me. Very good bike! Would buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Dias

customer_reviews.title: Loved it after I installed the handles correctly!
customer_reviews.text: We just received our bikes and so far we love them. Easy to assemble and light weight. I read comments below on how the pedals hit the front wheel. When I first assembled it I ran into the same problem. However, after further reading the directions I installed the bike handles backwards. Causing the pedals to hit the front bike and brake brake cords to not allow enough bike movement. The brakes need to be in front of the handles, not behind them. Unscrewed the handle, rotated and fixed! Hope that helps!
customer_reviews.author: Humberto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Budget Commuter Bike
customer_reviews.text: Bike was super easy to assemble. I ride it to/from work every day, 3.5 miles round trip and haven't had any issues in 6 months. Went through the stock brakes pretty quickly but that's not surprising. It's a little tough on hills of course since it's a single speed but it gets up quickly with a little effort. Overall, excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself cuz my old bike's new tires were gonna be almost as much as this bike in cost. Cant complain too much, for the price this is a great bike. You need to meticulously set up the bike to make it perform at its best. Bought adapters for the valves. Watch where you ride, bush stickers on the walkway made quick work of the tubes and i had to get new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon & Chad

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Then bike is definitely a large frame, very easy to ride, and pretty simple to assemble. Only problem, I hated the seat, which I replaced and no Kickstand included. I had to buy one aftermarket. Also the valve system is not standard. I had to buy that as well.
customer_reviews.author: ay2455

customer_reviews.title: Great bike regardless of price
customer_reviews.text: I ride this bike all the time. I'm about 225 lbs so I was a bit hesitant but everything works fine. I replaced the grips with a wider one since I have to lean forward and put more weight on the handles. I also replaced the petals since the reflextor fell off the ones that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: Built good, performs good, looks good. Best bang for your buck single speed/fixed gear I could find. Rear wheel alignment and chain tension was perfect from the factory. I flipped the wheel to fixed gear and it took a little patience to get chain tension and wheel alignment back to perfect. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike and very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say, after reading some reviews, both negative and positive, as well as doing some research, this bike is amazing, bike came in Earlier than expected. Easy instructions to assemble. I am 5’8 and this size(sm) was perfect for me. Bike is. Very light and a smooth ride. I did see some negative reviews as where some had issues with the pedal hitting the wheel but I made sure my spokes where facing the right direction. Again very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: The reviews that say the pedals hit the spokes or the pedals fall off are wrong, whoever put the bike together did it incorrectly. I have ridden this bike about 4 miles daily for about a month and haven’t had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great value Durable Bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a great durable and inexpensive bikes. Super comfortable to ride and I get tons of compliments on the bicycle. Its a very simple bike so assembly and maintenance is easy. I rode 900 miles this last year on it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cody R. Lusnia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, go to a bike shop
customer_reviews.text: It is super easy to put together, but one spin around the block, and I thought it was going to fall apart on me. The material is super flimsy, and there's no support from the road. You feel every bump and crack in the pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift and I had the option of purchasing it directly from Retrospec or Amazon, & I went w/the Amazon b/c of 2 day shipping option! Stylish, lightweight, easy to assemble! Must buy, highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. Easy to assemble (ignore the people putting the front fork on backwards). I think with a few upgrades (tires, seats) I should get a few years out of it easily.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Way too tall! Any size
customer_reviews.text: This product was a disappointment; it was beautiful, lightweight, easy to assemble, but the bike was way too tall for most people. The seat was up to my waist and I’m 5’4. My dad is 5’9 and it was even difficult for him to mount it. I returned it because it is unsafe. The size on the bike is the length of the bar, but the height (tires) is the same in all sizes. Really disappointing... not to mention it doesn’t have a stick to park, but I was willing to overlook that because I wanted it to work for me so badly.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Luna

customer_reviews.title: NICE BIKE, COULD BE BETTER
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO ASSEMBLE AND CAME PACKAGED GREAT! THE SEAT IS TINY AND UNCOMFORTABLE AND WILL BE REPLACING THE HANDLEBAR GRIPS AS WELL TO ACTUALLY ENJOY THE RIDE A LITTLE MORE
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to address those that think the cranks hit the wheel and that the brake arm hits the frame... You are doing it wrong. You have installed the handlebars with the forks pointing the wrong direction. Looks nice, great quality for the money. Goes together very quickly, mostly pre-assembled. I’m a long time home bike mechanic and this was ridable in about 10 -15 minutes from opening the box(make sure to check the headset tightness). For the price, this is a great bike
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Front brake cord was an issue!
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint on this bike is the cable cord for the front brake was already untwisted a bit and because of that I was not able to fix it entirely. I don’t know what kind of brake cord to even use for it and their website doesn’t say nor the description of the bike mentions it. So I assembled it, but because of the front brake that’s a safety issue and it’s a bummer cause I was looking forward to riding this bike when I got it. If anyone knows what brake cord to use please let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Completely UNSAFE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely unsafe. When the pedal is in the 9 o’clock position, it interferes with the front pedal. Absolutely terrible design and huge engineering flaw. Needs to get fixed before they have a large lawsuit on their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, but don’t assemble it yourself
customer_reviews.text: Had pros put the bike together ($60), but even they admitted it was a pretty nice bike for the price for a new rider. Has both fixed gear and single gear spokes.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: WHEN WE WANT TO SAVE MONEY OR PURCHASE SOMETHING THAT LOOKS GOOD, WE REFUSE TO BELIEVE THE TRUTH
customer_reviews.text: BELIEVE THE ONE STAR REVIEWS / WHEN WE WANT TO SAVE MONEY PURCHASE SOMETHING THAT LOOKS GOOD, WE REFUSE TO BELIEVE THE TRUTH Please don’t buy this bike. I know it’s cost effective, but the wheels are too big, the pedals hit the wheel. Before you spend your hard earn money that you worked so hard for ($11 an hours). Look at the consistency of the negative reviews. Trust me, you will end up like me writing a review to warn people not to make the mistake you made. But on another note, Love you guys. Happy holidays
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti

customer_reviews.title: It's been 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This bike was the best investment ever. Still sturdy and holding up well. Has been a great asset getting around during the pandemic in NYC. It's pretty light and stylish. I always get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Great bike with a solid feel.
customer_reviews.text: The bike looks amazing. Rides quick. Solid feel, stiff frame when your cranking hard. The bike responds to your every move. Great buy and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JustSaying

customer_reviews.title: Great bike but picking up lots of rust
customer_reviews.text: Bikes been great for Covid riding. 3 months in however it's picking up lots of rust - on the chain, pedals frame. We're in Newport RI and the bike has been stored indoor every single day. I'd say good value but they should work on getting the bike to last.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: In Retrospec, I should’ve bought a better bike
customer_reviews.text: 1. It came SUPER scratched up. 2. Wrong color. Ordered birch, not silver. 3. Bunch of the pieces/tools were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Howe

customer_reviews.title: It is fun to ride this stuff but not for hard terrain
customer_reviews.text: Great bike overall for people living in a city setting. The tires aren’t the best though but the frame and the brake are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Fakhry

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for in a bike for local flat-land leisure cycling. Easy to assemble with easy to follow instructions and toolset. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B, Vero Beach

customer_reviews.title: Short front wheel turning radius
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Rides ok. The front wheel radius is hampered by the brake placement Additionally if your foot is near front wheel while turning look out. It’s dangerous..The wheel cannot turn without hitting the pedal due to short frame I would return but tossed the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fixie bike
customer_reviews.text: Great fixie bike, couldn’t of asked for better. Not too heavy, good gearing which means you can get up hills, and looks great. I’m 6-3” and the largest size works great. Recommend getting a professional to set it up for peace of mind (costs about $60).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safety Hazard.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely doesn’t work pedals are in the way of the bike turning. Front brake system was installed backwards also preventing the bike to turn. My expiration date for return expired if not would have definitely returned it. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of expensive bikes. This is a great tool around bike. I go on rides with my kids, i go out on biking dates with my wife and i ride around the neighborhood on this. Ive probably put about 700-800 miles on it so far with no issues. I ride it as a fixie but the rear wheel can be flipped to a free wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Dean W.

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with the bike and the color looks like online
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the bike and the color looks like online, easy to put together, but the the chain broke at first try so had to buy a new one at a bike store. Otherwise it’s a good ride around manhattan’s streets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Delivered with missing parts. Now I need to try to find these from scratch or deal with a return on a bulkly item.
customer_reviews.author: Mike888

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Steal, Otherwise loved it for one week
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product and easy to assemble. Was stolen the first week I had it, even with a solid lock. For some reason I think this brand of bike is being targeted, and its unfortunate. My money evaporated immediately with this purchase. I am not sure if there is an easy way to steal this bike because of its design, which I am doubtful of, but heck, it was Gone in 60 Seconds, Nick Cage Style.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Sunnucks

customer_reviews.title: GREAT commuter bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: East to assemble - 30 mins just like all the other reviews said. Instructions are simple as long as you take it one step at a time. Since my first ride, I get a lot of compliments. The bike looks good, rides smooth, brakes well, and has performed just as I would have expected for an inexpensive set of wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Ya Boi J_hyphen_E

customer_reviews.title: Faulty design
customer_reviews.text: The front bake brake cable gets in the way of turning so you cannot turn the handle to your left. The pedal is really close to the front wheel making which can be dangerous when you turn. Please dont buy this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Luvchanel

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking, Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike, Great Value I rode this bike 70-80 miles a week; other than the handlebar grips sliding off, this bike was great. So great in fact that somebody stole it!!! :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bike when you assemble it correctly
customer_reviews.text: I read through the reviews before buying this bike and a lot of people said it was dangerous because the pedals hit the bike tire. They didn’t assemble the bike correctly. I wanted a simple road bike and this is perfect. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: We still makin 👕

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Went together quickly ... better than expected. Most of it was already together in the box ... just had to be assembled. Took about 30 minutes I have a child starting college and we just bought it for a back-and-forth for him... I think it’s going to fit the bill
customer_reviews.author: jtaxel

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my graduate student son. He uses it to ride to and from campus. He loves it. Perfect commuter bike.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. Was easy to assemble. I used it for more than 100km (65miles) and no problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Had it for like 2 months. I love it but did have to loosen the chain a little.
customer_reviews.author: eddie delgado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for riding around town!
customer_reviews.text: So light, love not having gears (I live in flat town). Rides nice. Great bike!
customer_reviews.author: dbiz

customer_reviews.title: Great city bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought my bike used so there was a couple of issues. I had to pry open the fork dropout just a little bit and force one axle nut onto the wheel. Whoever owned the bike before seemed to have intentially done this damage. Other than that, the bike works really well. Its lightwieght, adjustable and easy to ride. Its probably the best I've owned so far.
customer_reviews.author: One Retrospec buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for a solid entry-level bike.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy < 1 hour assembly and a very nice-looking bike. The frame feels sturdy and well-made; other pieces feel cheaper but can easily be swapped out. This is a great beginner commuter bike!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie D

customer_reviews.title: Some scratches but not too bad. I expected as much after reading reviews
customer_reviews.text: Some scratches but not too bad. I expected as much after reading reviews. Nice bike. I bout one used as they were sold out of new. It's missing a screw for the brake pad. Waiting to see if they can send a replacement. Would have been 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Can not assemble. Spend extra money on a better bike.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely impossible to assemble. I ran around several stores trying to find additional tools and hardware. Even when I finally had all the right tools I could not assemble. Instructions for assembly are incredibly vague. Do not waste your time. Spend the extra money on a bike that is worth the “expert assembly.” I am returning
customer_reviews.author: mary catherine

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.  Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: After several miles of use. Pedal stripped the threads in the crank. Front fork came assembled in the wrong direction. When trying to dissassemble and reassemble bearing balls flew everywhere. Terrible quality of parts and quality control with assembly. I know you get what you pay for, but would highly recommend trying a different brand of bike. Unless you just like assembling and disassembling bikes for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob R.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The bicycle came with missing one front wheel nut The seat is not a clamp system and difficult to tighten. Had to make appointment with a bicycle tech for the missing nut. So more money spent
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for 1 day 😅😭
customer_reviews.text: This was a great bike for the cost. Easy to build. I rode it 6 miles to work with relative ease. I really loved this bike. Unfortunately I live near Detroit and it was stolen within a day of me putting it together 😂. With a lock on it... bike 10/10 lock -1/10.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Dennis 19

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bike. It was my first assemble and it's pretty easy. I have no problems with the pedals hitting the tires as some people had.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Never buy from them again
customer_reviews.text: Terrible customer service. I had to buy a second bike, they took a whole week to tell me they didn’t have enough stock. The link for the bike was up for 2 days after I purchased it. The first one I got had a dings on it and didn’t ride smooth.
customer_reviews.author: suzy martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike For Price-As described
customer_reviews.text: Outside out the brakes this bike is great. I’ll need to get seat cushion as well. Getting ready to take it out for third time. First ride was 8 m, second over 10. Absolutely no issues assembling. Extremely happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chelajoy

customer_reviews.title: Great bike so far
customer_reviews.text: Great bike so far, easy to assemble, and it looks like an expensive bike. My only "complaint" is that the seat is pretty stiff, I would recommending adding a seat cushion if you plan on taking extended bike rides.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Annette

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: The bike is very solid, there are no real issues with it. I put about 35 miles on it the second day I had it. I figured out fairly quickly that the handle bars are bit of an awkward size and the seat is pretty uncomfortable in my opinion. But over all it's a great bike for the price range. Tad heavy though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dwevin

customer_reviews.title: id suggest getting this if you want a good bike for good workout
customer_reviews.text: I was a little iffy buying a bike online but it turned out I was wrong, it was easy to put together just had to tighten some nuts and bolts pretty much. I got it because I needed to start exercising more and this bike defiantly gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Simple, cheap,bike that works
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike is the tires are so skinny ( hard to change a flat) . That's it
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: value for money
customer_reviews.text: durable and nice. my everyday ride to work except for winter lol
customer_reviews.author: JLA

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for getting around my collage city.
customer_reviews.text: This bike was chosen because of the great value and it turned out to be great quality also. I have not had one problem since assembling the bike. It is a comfortable ride for my morning and afternoon commute to my collage classes and football practice facility.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous ordering a bike online, especially one so cheap. But after mine was stolen, i thought it was worth a try. Ive ridden it consistently for a month now and have no complaints. It was easy to assemble, its light and it gets me from A to B downtown!
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and 4 repairs and new parts
customer_reviews.text: It's been about three months since I purchased this bike...since then I've had to replace the crank, pedals, chain, and tube..with repairs it doubled the cost of the bike... always something wrong after I fix something...total garbage and not worth the money avoid
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, sweet ride especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Dewey W.

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: After disposing of ALL the packaging, I find out that the left petal is too big for the petal thread. I tried grease, no help at all. Now I’m left with a malfunctioning bike and no packaging to return it. What a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: KENNEDY

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bicycle. Excellent ride, styling , and great price. No problem assembling. Only issue was rear valve a bit bent and missing cap. Still 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike for riding around the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike to ride around with my daughter, it has been perfect so far! The only thing they don't tel you is you need a special piece to pump up the tire with a standard compressor. But you can buy the part at a bike store for .99 cents.
customer_reviews.author: Plummer84

customer_reviews.title: Chain Broke 1st Ride
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike a few months ago and literally just rode it today for the first time. The chain snapped after being on a ride for about 20 minutes. I would not recommend purchasing this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rogge

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value, Fantastic Ride
customer_reviews.text: This quickly became my favorite bike! I have owned mountain bikes, road bikes, tri bikes but this bike rides super smooth and I love the single speed. Something beautiful about the simplicity of it. Use it for commuting to the train daily.
customer_reviews.author: dburbank

customer_reviews.title: Seat was torn
customer_reviews.text: So far the bike has been great but the seat was torn when it arrived. How do I contact the company to see if they will send me a replacement seat?? Otherwise I would have given this bike 5 stars. It’s exactly what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Came as described in description. Easy to assemble. Rides well. Used for to and from work
customer_reviews.author: DONNA WAYCASTER

customer_reviews.title: Love these bikes
customer_reviews.text: Love these bikes, great for the price. Easy to put together, fast and reliable. I'm currently on my third one because people suck and keep stealing them.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend. Great looking bike and a smooth ride. I wouldn't advice this bike for mashing on the streets or doing tricks, but it's great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I switched the crank to a 42 which is much better for me
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a 46-16 gear range which is mighty hard to turn on any significant incline. I switched the crank to a 42 which is much better for me. Otherwise very nice bike and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered with bent rim and won’t hold air in rear tire. Purchased new tube, however, keeps happening due to bent outer rim
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for great price
customer_reviews.text: Great for what you pay for! Easy to put together since the brake and the chain are already attached. I’m 5’0 and got the small frame. Fits me perfect, but I am on my tiptoes when touching the ground. I recommend!l and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: presentation is good, but not sure that it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dooyoung Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bike! I bought this for my daughter for her birthday and it came in a box that wasn't huge, was easy to assemble and my daughter loves it! She rides it all the time! It's a really nice looking bike too!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: The bike is overall a great bike. Sturdy frame
customer_reviews.text: The bike is overall a great bike. Sturdy frame, great apperance and super fast. The only problem i am having is with the tires. One month into owning this bike. I caught 3 flats, and right now i think my best thing to do is to invest in better and more durable tires, as the ones that come with the bike are every skinny and flimsy. As i took a look at the tires, there were many cuts in them.
customer_reviews.author: Tyshaun h.

product_meta.title: Retrospec Harper Single-Speed Fixed Gear Urban Commuter Bike
product_meta.description: The harper is the single-speed bicycle you've been looking for-beautiful, lightweight, and affordable. It comes fully decked out with top shelf componentry including a flip-flop hub equipped with both, a fixed and a freewheel cog. Choose the fixed cog for a more aggressive riding style or the freewheel cog for effortless commuting. Single-speed/fixed-gear bikes are valued for their simplicity. With fewer moving parts they offer greater reliability and require less maintenance than bikes with multiple gears. Fewer parts also mean a lighter weight bike. The team at Critical Cycles takes quality very seriously. We sweat the details when designing our bikes, which is why we select brand name components to give you the best ride possible. Sleek, light, and agile, the harper will reward you with many miles of smooth reliable riding.
feature_bullets: Includes a flip-flop hub so you can ride fixed or with a freewheel
Premium hand-built, tig-welded, high-tensile strength steel frame absorbs the bumps in the road and is as durable as can be
Comes standard with 30mm deep-v rims, Kenda Kwest 700 x 28C tires, KMC chain, VP freestyle pedals, and two sets of brakes
All of the components required for a super smooth ride. All of our bikes have a weight limit of 220 lbs.
Includes all the tools you need for building and maintaining your own bicycle
